```{r,include=FALSE}
library(slickR)
library(widgetframe)
```

```{r,echo=FALSE}
objs <- c(
  'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/yonicd/gunflow/master/gunflow2.gif',
  'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/yonicd/regexSelect/master/Miscellaneous/gifs/regexSelectPlot.gif',
  'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/yonicd/slickR/master/Miscellaneous/Multimedia/gif/slickRnestingWidgets.gif',
  'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/metrumresearchgroup/texPreview/master/Miscellaneous/Multimedia/texPreviewPanZoom.gif','https://raw.githubusercontent.com/metrumresearchgroup/shinyCanvas/master/gifs/plotSize.gif')

myopts <- widgetframe::frameOptions()
myopts$align <- '"center"'

p1 <- slickR::slickR(obj=objs,
                     slickOpts = list(autoplay=TRUE,
                                      autoplaySpeed=5000,
                                      dots=TRUE),
                     width='75%',
                     height=300)

widgetframe::frameWidget(p1,width = '90%',options = myopts)
```
